title: The Artistic Loft: A Modern Retreat in the Heart of Oliwa
description:
Step into a luminous, spacious loft designed for both inspiration and tranquility. High ceilings and industrial touches fuse effortlessly with contemporary comforts, including a cutting-edge smart home system. This one-bedroom, one-bathroom sanctuary promises endless light, expansive creative zones, and seamless remote work functionality. The thoughtfully appointed interiors flow into communal spaces that are meticulously maintained, offering both exclusivity and connectivity.

A private underground garage—complete with EV charging station—protects your vehicle and enables sustainable living, while innovative exterior lighting guides you home during all hours.
neighborhood_description: Oliwa is Gdansk’s quintessential cultural enclave: eco-conscious yet vibrant, its leafy avenues are alive with galleries, artisan shops, and organic cafes. World-class public transport, scenic bike lines, and effortless highway access keep you connected to the rest of the city’s creative pulse. An outward-looking, community-focused spirit defines Oliwa, seamlessly blending green living with urban excitement, and providing everything from upmarket dining to tranquil parks within walking distance.
key_features: underground garage with EV charging station
lifestyle_benefits: perfect for remote work with dedicated office zones
target_buyer: Ideal for creative remote workers or freelancers who value artistic surroundings, green living, and robust city connectivity; perfect for those who crave inspiration both at home and at their doorstep.
market_positioning: Uniquely positioned in the ever-popular Oliwa, this rare loft adapts stylish living to the new remote work paradigm, wrapped in eco-luxury and located in one of Gdansk’s high-demand districts.
